plot: HipHop Alpstyle: Young farmer Markus falls in love with student Romi and although they couldn't be more different they find a common passion between ballet and break dance.
title: Rise Up! And Dance
plot_es: HipHop Alpstyle: Young farmer Markus falls in love with student Romi and although they couldn't be more different they find a common passion between ballet and break dance.
plot_en: HipHop Alpstyle: Young farmer Markus falls in love with student Romi and although they couldn't be more different they find a common passion between ballet and break dance.
